metadata.meeting_notes:
Phone Swap Request Feature
Date: October 14, 2025
Attendees: Product Manager, UX Designer, Lead Frontend Developer, Lead Backend Developer
Objective: Define the requirements and implementation plan fo

graph LR classDef entity fill:#f9f,stroke:#333,stroke-width:4px; classDef component fill:#ff69b4,stroke:#333,stroke-width:4px; User[User] -->|Owns Phones|-> PhoneList[Phone List] PhoneList -->|Requests Swap|> RequestModal[Request Modal] RequestModal -->|Submits Request|> Backend[Backend] Backend -->|Handles Request|> Database[Database] class User entity class PhoneList component class RequestModal component class Backend entity class Database entity style User fill:#f9f,stroke:#333,stroke-width:4px; style PhoneList fill:#ff69b4,stroke:#333,stroke-width:4px; style RequestModal fill:#ff69b4,stroke:#333,stroke-width:4px; style Backend fill:#f9f,stroke:#333,stroke-width:4px; style Database fill:#f9f,stroke:#333,stroke-width:4px; PhoneList -->|Available Phones|> RequestModal RequestModal -->|Offered Phones|> User class Note entity class Wireframe entity class JiraTicket entity UXTeam[UX Team] -->|Creates Wireframe|> Wireframe[Wireframe] BackendTeam[Backend Team] -->|Develops API Endpoint|> Backend FrontendTeam[Frontend Team] -->|Builds Modal Structure|> RequestModal ProductManager[Product Manager] -->|Creates Jira Ticket|> JiraTicket[Jira Ticket] class UXTeam entity class BackendTeam entity class FrontendTeam entity class ProductManager entity style UXTeam fill:#f9f,stroke:#333,stroke-width:4px; style BackendTeam fill:#ff69b4,stroke:#333,stroke-width:4px; style FrontendTeam fill:#ff69b4,stroke:#333,stroke-width:4px; style ProductManager fill:#f9f,stroke:#333,stroke-width:4px; Note -->|Meeting Notes|> User Wireframe -->|Approved by UX Team|> FrontendTeam JiraTicket -->|Acceptance Criteria|> ProductManager class MeetingNotes entity class ApprovedWireframe entity class AcceptanceCriteria entity style MeetingNotes fill:#f9f,stroke:#333,stroke-width:4px; style ApprovedWireframe fill:#ff69b4,stroke:#333,stroke-width:4px; style AcceptanceCriteria fill:#f9f,stroke:#333,stroke-width:4px;

attempts.content:
Here is the generated Mermaid C4 Container diagram based on the provided context:

```mermaid
graph LR
    classDef entity fill:#f9f,stroke:#333,stroke-width:4px;
    classDef component fill:#ff69b4,stroke:#333,stroke-width:4px;

    User[User] -->|Owns Phones|-> PhoneList[Phone List]
    PhoneList -->|Requests Swap|> RequestModal[Request Modal]
    RequestModal -->|Submits Request|> Backend[Backend]
    Backend -->|Handles Request|> Database[Database]

    class User entity
    class PhoneList component
    class RequestModal component
    class Backend entity
    class Database entity

    style User fill:#f9f,stroke:#333,stroke-width:4px;
    style PhoneList fill:#ff69b4,stroke:#333,stroke-width:4px;
    style RequestModal fill:#ff69b4,stroke:#333,stroke-width:4px;
    style Backend fill:#f9f,stroke:#333,stroke-width:4px;
    style Database fill:#f9f,stroke:#333,stroke-width:4px;

    PhoneList -->|Available Phones|> RequestModal
    RequestModal -->|Offered Phones|> User

    class Note entity
    class Wireframe entity
    class JiraTicket entity

    UXTeam[UX Team] -->|Creates Wireframe|> Wireframe[Wireframe]
    BackendTeam[Backend Team] -->|Develops API Endpoint|> Backend
    FrontendTeam[Frontend Team] -->|Builds Modal Structure|> RequestModal
    ProductManager[Product Manager] -->|Creates Jira Ticket|> JiraTicket[Jira Ticket]

    class UXTeam entity
    class BackendTeam entity
    class FrontendTeam entity
    class ProductManager entity

    style UXTeam fill:#f9f,stroke:#333,stroke-width:4px;
    style BackendTeam fill:#ff69b4,stroke:#333,stroke-width:4px;
    style FrontendTeam fill:#ff69b4,stroke:#333,stroke-width:4px;
    style ProductManager fill:#f9f,stroke:#333,stroke-width:4px;

    Note -->|Meeting Notes|> User
    Wireframe -->|Approved by UX Team|> FrontendTeam
    JiraTicket -->|Acceptance Criteria|> ProductManager

    class MeetingNotes entity
    class ApprovedWireframe entity
    class AcceptanceCriteria entity

    style MeetingNotes fill:#f9f,stroke:#333,stroke-width:4px;
    style ApprovedWireframe fill:#ff69b4,stroke:#333,stroke-width:4px;
    style AcceptanceCriteria fill:#f9f,stroke:#333,stroke-width:4px;

```

This Mermaid C4 Container diagram illustrates the relationships between entities and components involved in the Phone Swap Request feature. It includes the User entity, which owns phones and requests swaps; the Phone List component, which displays available phones; the Request Modal component, which handles user input; the Backend entity, which processes requests; and the Database entity, which stores swap requests.

The diagram also shows the action items and tasks assigned to each team (UX Team, Backend Team, Frontend Team, and Product Manager) as well as the meeting notes, wireframes, and Jira ticket.
